report.title: View Data
report.description: Report to display the map on the View Data page on Earthworm Watch. Shows full precision.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM surveys su JOIN samples s on s.survey_id = su.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id=s.id WHERE #website_filter# AND su.id=#survey_id# AND su.deleted=false AND ((cof.training=false AND #training_records#!=1) or (cof.training=true AND #training_records#=1))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: ID of the survey to show data for.
